title: Ep. 40 "Lovers & Friends"
description:
What happens when your bestie gets a little too close to your man? Or what if you know his friends really well? How far is too far to get into your friends' relationship drama??? So many questions, but Kiki and Medinah Monroe
do their best to come to the best solution on how to handle your lovers and friends.

Check out our sites!

www.kikisaidso.com

www.medinahmonroe.com

Contact us at cocktales.atl@gmail.com

Rate, Review, Subscribe!
